gateway.title: Let's help you get started
gateway.description: Select your business type and we'll explain what information you'll need to complete this application.

infoAlert.title: Is this you?
infoAlert.description: To keep your account details safe, we expect that the person completing this application holds primary control over financial and business operations for the business. If this is not you, please don't proceed below.

checklist.title: Here is what you'll need
checklist.description: Below is a checklist of what you'll need on hand.

overview.title: Overview
overview.infoAlert: Your data will be saved as you go.

verifyBusinessSection.title: Verify your business

reviewInProgress.title: Great work!
reviewInProgress.description: Please hang tight while we verify your details. This should only take a moment.

documentsReceived.title: We have your documents
documentsReceived.description: Please hang tight if you can while we verify your documents.

informationRequested.description: We're having trouble verifying your business. Please provide supporting documentation.

declined.title: Application declined
declined.description: We're sorry, but we cannot proceed with your application at this time.

approved.title: All set!
approved.description: Your business details have been verified

verifyBusinessSection.changeWarning: If you change this after starting the application, you may lose your saved progress.

bankAccountSection.title: Link a bank account for payouts

companyIdentification.contactPlatformOperator: If your business is outside of the United States, please contact Platform operator.

countryOfResidence.description: Please select your current country of residence

industry.label: Industry classification
industry.placeholder: Search by keyword or 6-digit NAICS code

organizationName.label: Legal name of the company
organizationName.description: Please enter this exactly as it appears on your business registration documents

validation.format: Business name can only contain letters, numbers, and the following special characters: ()_/&+%@#;,.: -?
validation.pattern: Invalid business name format. Please use only allowed characters
validation.minLength: Business name must be at least 2 characters
validation.maxLength: Business name must be at most 100 characters
validation.noLeadingSpace: Business name cannot start with a space
validation.noTrailingSpace: Business name cannot end with a space
validation.noConsecutiveSpaces: Business name cannot contain consecutive spaces
validation.noSpecialAtStart: Business name cannot start with a special character
validation.noSpecialAtEnd: Business name cannot end with a special character

validation.format: Invalid year of formation
validation.min: Year of formation cannot be before 1800
validation.max: Year of formation cannot be in the future
validation.invalid: Please enter a valid year between 1800 and current year

issuer.label: Issuing authority
issuer.description: Country where your ID was issued

validation.maxLength: Issuer must be 500 characters or less
Business Identification value must be 100 characters or less
validation.format: Business Identification value can only contain letters, numbers, and hyphens
validation.noSpaces: Business Identification value cannot contain spaces
validation.business_registration_idFormat: Business Registration Identification must be 5-15 alphanumeric characters
validation.business_registration_numberFormat: Business Registration Number must be 6-15 alphanumeric characters with optional dashes

validation.format: Invalid ID format
validation.itinFormat: ITIN must be exactly 9 digits and start with 9

validation.format: Invalid phone number format

organizationEmail.label: Company email address
organizationEmail.description: Provide the best email address to contact the business

validation.format: Email must be in a valid business email format
validation.maxLength: Email must be at most 100 characters
validation.noPersonal: Please use a business email address (no gmail.com, yahoo.com, etc.)

addresses.sectionDescription: Please provide the address registered to your company with your local authority

validation.maxLength: Address line must be 60 characters or less
validation.pattern: Address can only contain letters, numbers, and basic punctuation
Postal code must be exactly 5 digits

validation.minItems: At least {{count}} address line is required

validation.minItems_one: At least one address is required
validation.uniqueTypes: Each address type must be unique

dbaNameNotAvailable.label: Same as legal name of the company

websiteNotAvailable.label: My business doesn't have a website

website.description: Please provide a URL for your business

validation.maxLength: Website URL must be 500 characters or less
validation.httpsRequired: Website URL must start with https://
validation.format: Website must be a valid URL (e.g., https://www.example.com)
validation.noIp: Website URL cannot be an IP address

validation.maxLength: DBA name must be 100 characters or less
validation.format: DBA name can only contain letters, numbers, and the following special characters: ()_/&+%@#;,.: -?
validation.pattern: Invalid DBA name format. Please use only allowed characters
validation.noLeadingSpace: DBA name cannot start with a space
validation.noTrailingSpace: DBA name cannot end with a space
validation.noConsecutiveSpaces: DBA name cannot contain consecutive spaces
validation.minLength: DBA name must be at least 2 characters

organizationDescription.label: Business description
organizationDescription.description: Please provide a summary of the products and services you offer to consumers. 1,000 characters maximum. Please don’t use special characters (e.g. * @ %, etc).

validation.maxLength: Business description must be 500 characters or less
validation.minLength: Business description must be at least 10 characters
validation.noHtml: Business description cannot contain HTML tags

tooltipContent.exampleText: {Business name} creates sustainable and affordable beauty and hair care products that are vegan and cruelty free. Our top selling products are our organic citrus shampoo and conditioner line as well as our paraben and sulfate free mascara.
tooltipContent.alignmentNote: Please ensure this aligns with the business classification you have selected.
tooltipContent.visibilityText: No. This is used for compliance and regulatory purposes only.

validation.format: Email must be in a valid business email format
validation.maxLength: Email must be at most 100 characters
validation.noPersonal: Please use a business email address (no gmail.com, yahoo.com, etc.)

validation.format: Email must be in a valid business email format
validation.maxLength: Email must be at most 100 characters
validation.noPersonal: Please use a business email address (no gmail.com, yahoo.com, etc.)

validation.required: At least one government ID is required
validation.uniqueTypes: Each ID type must be unique

idType.label: ID type
idType.tooltip: should match your individual ID type

description.label: Description
description.tooltip: should match your business registration documents ID description

validation.maxLength: Description must be 100 characters or less

value.label: ID value
value.tooltip: should match your individual ID number

validation.format: Invalid ID format
validation.itinFormat: ITIN must be exactly 9 digits and start with 9

expiryDate.label: Expiry date
expiryDate.description: Date when the individual ID expires
expiryDate.tooltip: Date when the individual ID expires

validation.format: Expiry date must be in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format
validation.past: Expiry date cannot be in the past
validation.tooFar: Expiry date cannot be more than 10 years in the future

issuer.label: Issuer
issuer.tooltip: should match your business registration documents ID issuer

validation.exactlyTwoChars: Issuer must be a 2-letter country code

controllerJobTitleDescription.label: Job title description
controllerJobTitleDescription.description: Brief description of your role and responsibilities

validation.maxLength: Description must be at most 50 characters
validation.pattern: Description can only contain letters, numbers, and basic punctuation
validation.required: Description is required when job title is Other.

ownerJobTitleDescription.label: Job title description
ownerJobTitleDescription.description: Brief description of your role and responsibilities

validation.maxLength: Description must be at most 50 characters
validation.pattern: Description can only contain letters, numbers, and basic punctuation
validation.required: Description is required when job title is Other.

natureOfOwnership.label: Nature of ownership
natureOfOwnership.description: How you own or control the organization

soleOwner.label: Sole owner
soleOwner.description: Whether you are the sole owner of the organization

validation.required: Please specify if you are the sole owner

validation.format: Invalid phone number format
Invalid phone number format
Invalid phone number format
Invalid phone number format
Invalid phone number format
Invalid phone number format

usePersonalAddress.label: Use personal address as business address
usePersonalAddress.description: Check if your business address is the same as your personal address

usePersonalPhone.label: Use personal phone as business phone
usePersonalPhone.description: Check if your business phone is the same as your personal phone

solePropOrganizationName.label: Business Name
solePropOrganizationName.description: Your business's legal name as it appears on government forms
solePropOrganizationName.tooltip: Must match exactly with your business registration documents

validation.format: Business name can only contain letters, numbers, and the following special characters: ()_/&+%@#;,.: -?
validation.minLength: Business name must be at least 2 characters
validation.maxLength: Business name must be at most 100 characters

solePropDbaName.label: Doing Business As (DBA) Name
solePropDbaName.placeholder: Enter DBA name if different from business name
solePropDbaName.description: The name under which you conduct business, if different from your legal business name

validation.maxLength: DBA name must be 100 characters or less

solePropBusinessDescription.label: Business Description
solePropBusinessDescription.description: Brief description of your business operations and services

validation.maxLength: Description must be 500 characters or less
validation.minLength: Description must be at least 10 characters

solePropBusinessEmail.label: Business Email
solePropBusinessEmail.description: Email address used for business communications

validation.format: Must be a valid email address
validation.maxLength: Email must be at most 100 characters

solePropYearStarted.label: Year Business Started
solePropYearStarted.description: Year when you started your business operations

validation.format: Must be a valid year
validation.max: Year cannot be in the future

solePropEin.label: Employer Identification Number (EIN)
solePropEin.description: Your business tax ID number (if you have one)
solePropEin.tooltip: EIN is optional for sole proprietors unless you have employees

validation.format: EIN must be in XX-XXXXXXX format

solePropPersonalInfo.label: Personal Information
solePropPersonalInfo.description: Your personal information as the business owner

countryOfCitizenship.label: Country of Citizenship
countryOfCitizenship.description: The country where you hold citizenship

validation.exactlyTwoChars: Country code must be exactly 2 characters

idValueDescriptions.EIN: A unique nine-digit number, assigned by the IRS, that identifies your company as a business operating in the United States.
idValueDescriptions.BUSINESS_REGISTRATION_ID: A unique ID assigned by the state or province where your business is registered.
idValueDescriptions.BUSINESS_NUMBER: A unique number assigned by the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) to identify your business.
idValueDescriptions.BUSINESS_REGISTRATION_NUMBER: A unique number assigned by the state or province where your business is registered.

generalOrganizationTypeDescriptions.SOLE_PROPRIETORSHIP: I'm the sole owner of my business
generalOrganizationTypeDescriptions.REGISTERED_BUSINESS: I manage a registered business, like a $t(organizationTypes.LIMITED_LIABILITY_COMPANY)
generalOrganizationTypeDescriptions.OTHER: I work in a different organizational, like a non-profit or state-owned entity
